If this email consists of direct marketing material and you would prefer to be removed from the mailing list, please reply to this email with the word "Unsubscribe" as the Subject.

Hi Sarah-Jane, 

Thanks for letting me know.

I will keep the US subscription active as you have recently paid for a month and allocate this to the AU site. 

Once you launch the new AU site, we will then deactivate the subscription. 

I have also voided invoice INV-3032, which was the annual renewal for the AU site. 

Finally, confirming the US site is now offline. You will need your IT team to direct this domain to the .com.au site. 

Let me know if you have any questions?

Hi Heath,

I'm sorry for the delay, the new website is due to go live next week therefore we will no longer require the U.S. version of the website. Can we please cancel the second subscription we have which points to www.axiomworkplace.com

Instead, I am going to have that URL redirect back to www.axiomworkplaces.com.au as the U.S. idea was a bit premature and unfortunately derailed due to covid.

In regards to the current www.axiomworkplaces.com.au that is being hosted by WP Perk, I'll be in touch next week to talk about cancelling that subscription, but obviously won't happen until the new site is ready.

Thank you!

Kind Regards
Sarah-Jane LamontMarketing Operations Manager

Hi Sarah-Jane, 

Just checking in on this change over of account. How are things progressing at your end.

Hi Sarah-Jane, 

Yes that's fine, you will be able to cancel at anytime as you have been with us longer than 12 months.

Hi Heath,

Thanks for getting back to me so quickly. That link says we have to sign up for a 12 month term however the reason for switching to monthly invoices is because we can't commit to 12 months, it may only be 2-3 months. Can this be amended please?

Kind Regards
